title: Drawing, "Costume Design: Iniate Wiate in Dumas et Fils", ca. 1967
medium: Point of brush and black ink, watercolor, opaque watercolor, graphite, green fabric swatch attached to support at upper life; on gray illustration board.
signed: Signed in point of brush and black ink at lower right: Freddy Wittop
inscribed: Inscribed in point of brush and black ink at upper right: Dumas. / INIA -TE / WAITE '; in graphie at lower left: 2406-1. Verso: inscribed in pen and black ink at upper left: Dumas et fils / L.A. Light Opera Comp
description: Man, yellow shirt, brown pants, elaborate vest. At right, version with coat on, hat in left hand. Costume Design: Iniate Wiate in Dumas et Fils

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design: Iniate Wiate in Dumas et Fils", ca. 1967.
ca. 1967. Point of brush and black ink, watercolor, opaque watercolor, graphite, green fabric swatch attached to support at upper life; on gray illustration board.. Gift of Freddy Wittop. 1971-1-14.
